attributes.action: Get tough with Banks and building societies that have received cash injections from taxpayers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having just asked the Halifax for assistance due to rising mortgage costs and been refused after being a customer for 21 years. I FIND IT AN AFRONT TO MYSELF AS A TAXPAYER TO BE TREATED BADLY BY MY BANK no doubt other customers of other banks are in the same position

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.Your title should be a clear and specific call for action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
